name: Delicate Stooshies
description:
A series of conversation-driven vignettes touching on life, art, science, relationships, mortality, sex, crime, garbage, the Los Angeles art scene, the postal service, kink, cinema, the sharing economy and death.

Made in fourteen days for Adventure Jam 2017 (#advjam2017).

STOOSHIE FEATURES:

  • Ten scenes, each set in a different time and place.
  • Built in a custom engine (on top of Godot). It's like Twine-but-with-graphics, or alternatively SCUMM-but-without-inventory-puzzles-and-backtracking-and-instead-lots-of-those-conversation-cutscene-things.
  • Around 40 minutes long
  • Graphics and sound sourced from public domain and CC licenced media.
